settings.heading: Throw Those Over-the-counter "Solutions" Away!
settings.text:
If you're a frequent nasal spray user, you may have noticed that your symptoms don't improve much, despite your best efforts...
Newsflash... Over-the-counter "solutions" are to blame!
settings.textw:
This is called rebound congestion, a condition where the nasal passages become dependent on over-the-counter sprays for relief, and worsens when the spray is not used...

This leads to thinning nose tissues, deteriorating nasal cartilage, and more frequent nosebleeds...

And if you're already taking other medications, OTC solutions may interact with them, leading to further complications!
settings.fact: Don't settle for short-term relief that do harm more than good in the long run
settings.bottom: It's Time To Switch To a Natural & Drug-Free Remedy With ZERO Side Effects!

settings.heading: Congestion Relief Has Never Been Easier, Thanks to Cleanux!
settings.text: You haven't experienced the true benefits of clear sinuses until you try Cleanux. This will be the most effortless and effective way to improve your nasal health. Because you deserve to breathe easy!

Developed by a team of Leading Sinus Specialists, Cleanux is a cutting-edge nasal decongestion and sinus cleansing device that rejuvenates your nasal passages and transcends your breathing experience.

It uses a powerful yet controlled and gentle stream of water to instantly dislodge stubborn mucus buildup in your nose, and wash away all pesky irritants and culprits of nasal discomfort.

You can instantly sense your nasal pathways opening up, allowing for better airflow and breathing!

And the best part? It's safe for daily use, and provides natural & long-lasting relief, without worrying about unwanted side effects or potential issues from long-term medication use!

settings.heading: Difficulty breathing through the nose?
settings.row_content: When the nasal passages are blocked, it becomes challenging to breathe through the nose, resulting in difficulty inhaling sufficient air.

settings.heading: Snoring and waking up unable to breathe?
settings.row_content: Congestion in the nasal passages, whether due to mucus buildup, can contribute to both snoring and sleep apnea by blocking the airways, making air unable to circulate properly in the nose.

settings.heading: Dealing with constant allergy attacks?
settings.row_content: allergens like pollen, dust, or pet dander, invade through the nose, causing inflammation in the sinuses and triggering symptoms like itching, sneezing, runny nose, and postnasal drip..

settings.heading: Difficulty falling asleep?
settings.row_content: Sinus issues can make it hard to fall asleep because sinus congestion or inflammation can cause difficulty breathing, leading to discomfort and an inability to relax. Additionally, sinus pressure can make it difficult to find a comfortable sleeping position, further impeding the ability to fall asleep.

settings.heading: Constant headaches and sinus pressure?
settings.row_content: When sinus cavities are inflamed and stuffed with mucus, and with low air circulation, it results in pressure in the sinus area and a feeling of fullness in the head along with dizziness.

settings.heading: Always relying on sprays for relief?
settings.row_content: Sinus issues can cause difficulty breathing during sleep, resulting in poor quality sleep and fatigue upon waking up.

settings.caption: If the answer is YES to any of these questions.. Cleanux is definitely a must-have!

settings.heading: How often can I use CLEANUX ?
settings.row_content:
You can use CLEANUX as often as you wish! We suggest you use it twice a day, just like brushing your teeth. However, CLEANUX is completely natural and drug-free, and health professionals agree that it’s safe to use as often as needed or wanted.

We recommend that new users use CLEANUX twice a day for the first couple of weeks-once in the morning and again before bed. This will give you a very good idea of the benefits you can enjoy with daily nasal care. Ultimately, you will find your own level of use. It may be three times a day; it may be three times per week; it may be more in the winter or more during heavy pollen seasons.

settings.heading: How long is an irrigation cycle?
settings.row_content:
CLEANUX irrigation cycle can last from about 10 seconds to a minute, depending on personal anatomy and congestion.

Most cycles last from 20 to 30 seconds. The cycle is complete when the water tank is empty.

settings.heading: What type of water should I use?
settings.row_content:
Please use ONLY filtered, distilled, or previously boiled water for nasal irrigation using CLEANUX.

Most users prefer to warm their water prior to use. If you do this, do not overheat the water. It should be lukewarm to the touch and not hotter than about 85°– 90°F (29°– 32°C).

settings.heading: Will It hurt?
settings.row_content:
Actually, you'll hardly feel anything during the irrigation cycle! Best of all, nasal irrigation provides benefit of a clean nose and relief from sinus congestion.

So why not take the CLEANUX Challenge: Use CLEANUX twice a day for two weeks and find out what improved nose-breathing and a clean nose can do for you!

Your satisfaction is unconditionally guaranteed by our 30-Day, Zero-Risk Trial, so you have nothing to lose and everything to gain!

settings.heading: Can more than one person use CLEANUX ?
settings.row_content: To avoid the risk of spreading germs from one user to another, the best practice hygienically is for each user to have his or her own device.

settings.heading: How often should I clean the device?
settings.row_content:
Properly clean the device after use so that viruses and bacteria from your nose are not transferred to the device and the germs are not given the opportunity to colonize and be reintroduced into the nose upon subsequent use.

If you use the device daily and rinse it thoroughly before and after use, the risk is quite small. If the device is properly cleaned after use, the risk can be eliminated completely.

After each use, rinse the water tank thoroughly with warm water to remove any residual saline and allow to air dry. (Soap and water may also be used periodically for cleaning.) It is beneficial to frequently rinse the unit after use by running through a full reservoir of pure warm water until there is no more water in the reservoir and none is being ejected from the tip.

Once the water has all gone, continue to allow the unit to run for about 5 seconds to push out any residual moisture. Be sure to wipe down the unit regularly to remove any saline solution that may have spilled on the exterior to minimize accumulation of salt deposits.

settings.heading: Can CLEANUX work with saline solution?
settings.row_content: CLEANUX can be used with a saline solution, but ONLY filtered, distilled, or previously boiled water should be used with or without packets. Please follow all usage directions mentioned in our user manual, any water other than mentioned above is not considered to be properly filtered and can cause infections.

settings.heading: Is CLEANUX travel-friendly?
settings.row_content:
Neither the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) nor the airlines impose limitations on traveling with CLEANUX. It can be packed in your carry-on or checked baggage.

The situation with Salt Packages is a little different. According to the TSA website, passengers may bring up to a quart-sized bag of liquids in a carry-on. The individual items must be in small containers that are each 3.4 ounces or less. According to TSA, "Placing these items in a small bag and separating them from your carry-on baggage facilitates the screening process. Pack items that are in containers larger than 3.4 ounces or 100 milliliters in checked baggage."

The good news is that each CLEANUX Salt Package contains 0.13 oz of saline concentrate, so you can carry on as many Packages as can be placed in a quart-sized Ziploc bag (it's a lot!).
